medical_history.chief_complaint: Worsening right upper quadrant (RUQ) pain for 3 weeks.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 3 weeks ago and have worsened over time. The patient was previously treated with cipro/flagyl for presumed diverticulitis after being seen by a PCP last week.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension (HTN), hypercholesterolemia (HCHOL). Past surgical history includes cyst removal on upper abdomen and warts removal on left neck.
